value:
$nMPID_マルス|It's so hot. Maybe if I just took this
mask off... Ah! But my identity! Ugh...

$nMPID_マルス|Why was I summoned with Mia, and
why are we wearing swimsuits? What
could fate have in store for us?

$nMPID_ワユ|Should I say something to Marth?
...If that mask stays on, there'll be
one WEIRD tan line underneath.

$nMPID_ワユ|As warriors, we should compete!
How about...a watermelon-smashing
contest! ...I'm first up!

$nMPID_ワユ|I've always wanted to try wearing
an outfit like this... I have to show
the other mercenaries!

$nMPID_マルス|I am Marth. If you are curious why
I'm wearing this outfit... See this
note from $Nf.

$nMPID_ワユ|Summer is my time of year! C'mon,
Marth, let's have some fun!

$nMPID_マルス|I will not be caught off guard...
regardless of the outfit!

$nMPID_マルス|My apologies! Is there...anything
I can do to fix this?

$nMPID_マルス|A summertime gift? I will treat
it with utmost care.

Hi, I'm Mia—and this is Marth! Seems
we share a connection... Our love of
the beach in summer!

$nMPID_ワユ|This has been so much fun! Don't
you agree, Marth? You enjoyed the
beach too, right?$k$p$nMPID_マルス|...Yes, I did. Though, spending time
at the beach in the middle of a war
does give me pause...$k$p$nMPID_ワユ|No need for that. It's important
to have fun once in a while—and
this is one of those onces!$k$pIf we're always training and working
and fighting, we won't have any time
for enjoying ourselves!$k$p$nMPID_マルス|Hm... You make a fair point. In that
case, I'll follow your lead and do my
best to have fun!
やあっ
Summer time!
So cold!
$nMPID_二人|Tropical attack!
$nMPID_二人|It's a duel! I'm here too!
$nMPID_ワユ|Summer is the best!
$nMPID_マルス|Vanish beneath the waves!
I'm drowning...!
I lost? No!
Take care not to burn.
I am here with you.

• "Let's go!"
• "Let's."

• "The waves are astounding!"
• "I'm diving in!"
Giggle

• "So, how do you like your swimsuit?"
• "Appropriate to this adventure."
Onward!
Woohoo!
The sand is rather hot!
$nMPID_ワユ|Woo boy, is it hot!
$nMPID_マルス|Very much so...

$nMPID_ワユ|OK. I don't know how to put this, so I'll
just say it. Turns out you were a girl
this whole time! Talk about a surprise!

$nMPID_マルス|Please do not make such a fuss
about it.

$nMPID_ワユ|Sorry! It's just...you've still got your
mask on. It's a little weird, right?

$nMPID_マルス|Weird!? There are many masked
Heroes. Are there not?!

$nMPID_ワユ|Well, yes... But who wears a mask with
a swimsuit?

$nMPID_マルス|I see your point. I had fervently wished
to enjoy the ocean, but...

I suppose fate had something else in
store. I'll go change out of this
swimsuit immediately.

$nMPID_ワユ|Wait, what? Why not just take off
the mask?

$nMPID_マルス|That I simply cannot do. I must never
reveal my face...
$nMPID_ワユ|Uh, really? Really really?

$nMPID_マルス|Indeed. And I had so looked forward to
building sandcastles, splashing in the
waves... *sigh*$k$pNow, if you'll excuse me, I shall go.

$nMPID_ワユ|Hey, wait a minute! I didn't mean— You
don't have to— Hey!

Look, it's a little weird... No, it's really
weird! But that's OK! Let's just swim.
Forget I said anything!
$nMPID_マルス|Are you sure? I thank you.

$nMPID_ワユ|Don't worry about it! Come on,
don't cry!

About the only thing you'll have to
worry about is a really weird suntan
on your face... Come on! I'll race you!
